about.title: About Me
about.text1: I'm Amanda, I'm 24 years old and I recently graduated in Control and Automation Engineering by UFMG. At the moment I live in Belo Horizonte - MG, where I also practice circus and share my love for reading and science in my social media. I'm currently pursuing a speacialization in Software Engineering by PUC Minas and I work as a Junior Software Engineer. With the combination of a creative sight and an analytical mind, my goal is to develop innovative solutions that impacts society.

projects.title: Projects
projects.allena: Chrome extension with AI to make websites accessible to people with disabilities through voice commands. The back-end was developed by me and Ellen Morgana and the front-end by Laissa Soares. Winner of the Inovathon WTM 2025.
projects.bibibot: Bot to send Amazon book promotions in a Telegram group. Developed for influencers to automate the sending of promotions through the Amazon affiliate link.
projects.pairbnb: App similar to AirBnB for couples. Allows login, booking or offering accommodations and managing reservations. Project from the Ionic Course - Build iOS, Android & Web Apps with Ionic & Angular.
projects.pfc: Electronic device aimed at the elderly with features that ensure their safety in daily life. In addition, it comes with an app to show the data to the family.
projects.eyetracker: Eye tracker developed to allow communication through a keyboard controlled only by eye movement.
projects.conversia: App that transforms facial gestures into communication for people unable to speak and move. I developed the native Android part of the app, to allow control of a tablet only with facial movements and gestures.
projects.conectix: Device to turn the TiX Keyboard into Bluetooth. I developed the firmware of the device, which allows communication between the TiX Keyboard, the computer and external triggers via Bluetooth.
projects.goodreads_text: Data analysis with the 'Goodreads-books' database using SQL to perform queries and Python to visualize the data.

awards.title: Awards
awards.inovathon: 1st place in the Redefine Possible competition with the SheCodes team. We proposed Allena, an AI solution to promote digital accessibility on the web.
awards.biochallenge: 3rd place in the 1st National Biomedical Engineering Competition. We developed a device to assist visually impaired people in mobility.
